project.caption: WINC3400 enterprise security mschapv2 example - SAMG55 XPlained Pro
project.info: This example demonstrates how to connect WINC3400 Wi-Fi module to a 802.1x enterprise secured network which uses MSCHAPV2 as phase2 authentication. The supported enterprise methods by this example are EAP-TTLSv0 with MSCHAPv2 ( Extensible Authentication Protocol Tunneled Transport Layer Security Authenticated Protocol Version 0) EAP-PEAPv0 with MSCHAPv2 (Protected Extensible Authentication Protocol v0 - Microsoft Challenge Handshake Authentication Protocol version 2) EAP-PEAPv1 with MSCHAPv2 (Protected Extensible Authentication Protocol v1 - Microsoft Challenge Handshake Authentication Protocol version 2)
